rows.label: tlk45320121_01_msg0001
rows.name:
The Superbian army is always eager for
new recruits! How about it, kids? Ever
thought about becoming a Driver?

rows.label: tlk45320121_01_msg0002
rows.name:
What?! You're already Drivers?!
Even better! We can get you
enrolled immediately!

rows.label: tlk45320121_01_msg0003
rows.name:
Our Drivers aren't expected to be
bound to any one Blade.

rows.label: tlk45320121_01_msg0004
rows.name:
All you need is a Core Crystal and you
can have a whole bevy of Blades!

rows.label: tlk45320121_01_msg0005
rows.name:
See what useful information I've
divulged? It would be rude to turn
down my offer now, surely...
